page.title: 16Summary of Trumpington
page.content: The area between Trumpington and Great Shelford is south of the city of Cambridge. It is largely a commuting area with most people travelling daily to Cambridge and some to London. Trumpington is close to the ringroad and access to the city is good and takes about ten minutes depending on the traffic. Although there is a bus service many people use private cars. Trumpington also has a lot of through traffic especially since the building of the M11 and this no doubt has increased trade in the village, particularly for the garages and public houses. House prices have risen rapidly and it is considered an attractive area. Some houses are very large but there has been more recent building of modest sized semi-detatched houses.
